Detailed Description

The class representing a battle arena and all of the objects that it contains.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::list<ArenaObject*> Arena::ArenaObjectList [private]

A list of arena objects.

This must be synchronized with tanks, bullets and bonuses.

Definition at line 41 of file arena.hpp.

typedef std::list<MobileObject*> Arena::MobileObjectList [private]

A list of mobile arena objects.

This must be synchronized with tanks and bullets.

Definition at line 44 of file arena.hpp.

typedef std::list<Tank*> Arena::TankList [private]

A list of tanks.

Pointers, for polymorphism; elements must be deleted by the arena.
